name: Register Voters
instructions: Call first, then send a text!

callActions.name: Are you registered?
callActions.callScript: Hello {{{contact.firstName}}}! Are you registered to vote?

textActions.name: Check your party affiliation
textActions.messageContent: Hey {{{contact.firstName}}} -- since you're already registered, be sure to check your affiliation before the upcoming election!

textActions.name: Here's the link
textActions.messageContent: Hey {{{contact.firstName}}} -- here's that voter registration link: http://rockthevote.com

name: Spread the Word via Text
instructions: Send as many texts as you can!
